topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539e609f6368722182150300#post_539e609f6368722182150300

As far as I could tell from the last Open Server Weekend there isn't even much of a leveling system. All the looks are there, but the actual mechanic wasn't in place as far as I could tell. So I can't speak for how grindy it'll be.

Though, a lot of the quests are over glorified fetch quests, or talking to specific NPCS, 75% of the time without quest markers or a proper quest journal at the moment. So you just sort of aimlessly wander around, trying to speak to ponies hoping the server won't disconnect you.

I raised some points, concerns, and basic suggestions. But then an ass hole programmer came through and gave me an ass hole response after saying how he can't do it.

Bullshit, work around the restrictions. I see it done in the modding project I'm in. Anything can be done you stupid gits.
